name: Feedly Wide Dark Glass
description: Wider feeds, cleared spam, themes. Find more background images for this style here http://imgur.com/a/1jbO4/all
obsoletion_message: temporary deleted till the death of google reader
additional_info:
Tips: 
- sidebar text can be changed from white to black and vice versa by changing from dark to light themes on this page - https://feedly.com/#themes
- when you use your own pictures, to achieve perfect look use the same resolution ratio for background and glass, resolutions can be different.

Some feeds can look broken due to their custom design - feel free to mention those feeds in the comments if you need them fixed
